definition[0]: a dry brown fruit inside a hard shell, that grows on a tree
example[2]: We were sitting round the fire cracking nuts (=opening them).
definition[1]: a small piece of metal with a hole through the middle which is screwed onto a bolt to fasten things together
example[3]: Use a wrench to loosen the nut.
definition[2]: someone who is crazy or behaves strangely
example[4]: My dad is such a nut.
example[5]: What are you, some kind of nut?
example[6]: Oh come on, use your nut!
definition[4]: to hit someone with your head
example[7]: He just turned round and nutted me!
definition[5]: (the National Union of Teachers) one of the main professional trade unions which represents teachers in England and Wales, in both government and private schools
